entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
